name: Pytner
short_description:
**This software is still under developement.**
Pytner is a Python based Leitner learning system which has been proven to be very efficient for learning new vocabularies(Wikipedia).

But what is new in Pytner than other flashcard softwares? 

Pytner is a simple flashcard software, but it comes with an active audio-file generation. That means, you can enable the software to generate audio files of the words you did not know. I found this very effective, because I could use the dead time (waiting for bus/train) or before getting to sleep, and listen to the audio files of the new words. The audio files for each day won't be more than some minutes = not boring!!

A sample study plan could be like this:
- enter some new words everyday (10-15)
- work with the software 5-10 min a day and just click if you can remember the meaning or not.
- copy the audio files in your device and listen to them (less than 10 min) in the daily dead time.

For a tutorial, please check the Wiki.
Enjoy
summary: Leitner flash card system based on Python
